nodes.text: Secure Storage was a sector of the Maximum Security Section of Belsavis prison, a Galactic Republic prison complex on the planet Belsavis. Secure Storage was a walled-off section of the prison with a subterranean vault underneath Meltwater Pond to the north, and was located in the southeastern corner of Maximum Security. During the invasion of Belsavis, the western wall was breached, and the area overrun by prisoners.
